#Text=Dress Up Your Basics
#Text=If you have a wardrobe full of basics , good for you .
#Text=You 've got the hard part down .
#Text=Now , you just need to figure out how to dress up those looks when you need to .
#Text=You probably already have what you need in your wardrobe to create dressier looks , such as suit jackets or cardigans .
#Text=Accessories also are key to creating more sophisticated looks , which you probably already have on hand .
#Text=Steps
#Text=Creating Dressier Looks
#Text=Consider getting your basics tailored .
#Text=If you have a limited wardrobe , making sure your clothes fit really well can make them seem dressier .
#Text=It can be cheaper to take well-made clothes you already have to a local tailor than to buy a higher class , better fitting wardrobe .
#Text=Add a jacket to dress up a shirt .
#Text=One simple way to dress up a shirt is to pair it with a suit jacket .
#Text=This simple step makes a plain button-up shirt or even a nice t-shirt into a dressed-up outfit that you can wear to work or even for a night out on the town .
#Text=Similarly , adding a skirt or nice pants to a blouse will create a dressier look .
#Text=Put on a cardigan for a more sophisticated look .
#Text=A cardigan wo n't solve all your wardrobe problems .
#Text=However , adding a cardigan over a classic black tank , for instance , can make the look much dressier .
#Text=Button at least a few of the buttons for a classier look .
#Text=Use a belt .
#Text=A belt can act solely as an accessory , but it can also help you change up the look of your wardrobe .
#Text=For instance , you can wear a skinny belt over a tight-fitting suit jacket or add one on top of a dress to create a waistline .
#Text=Doing so can make your look more polished and put-together .
#Text=For guys , a belt can help tie a look together , so pick one that is classic and sophisticated , such as a leather belt in black or brown .
#Text=Adding Accessories
#Text=Choose statement jewelry .
#Text=One easy way to dress up basic pieces is to choose jewelry that adds a pop of color to your outfit .
#Text=You could try a big chunky necklace in a bright color , for instance , to dress up a plain top .
#Text=Alternatively , you could pick some sparkly earrings to make a statement with a dress .
#Text=Bangle bracelets or dainty metallic bracelets can also elevate an outfit , depending on the occasion .
#Text=For a guy , consider adding a snazzy tie clip or a fancy watch .
#Text=Pick a scarf to add pizzazz .
#Text=In the winter , a thick blanket scarf can turn a boring outfit into something much more interesting and sophisticated .
#Text=Try plaid with neutrals or a soft grey to break up a black outfit .
#Text=In the summer , a lightweight shimmery scarf can add a touch of interest .
#Text=In the winter , you can also add fancy gloves for a dressier outdoor outfit .
#Text=For guys , a well-made classic wool scarf can add sophistication , while a tie in a subtle pattern can add a bit of flair .
#Text=Add a well-made handbag .
#Text=A well-made handbag can make any outfit dressier .
#Text=If you pick something that fits the style of what you 're wearing , it can elevate the outfit .
#Text=The opposite is also true .
#Text=If you wear the same sloppy handbag with every outfit , it can bring it down .
#Text=You do n't need hundreds of bags , but try having two or three nice bags that go with most of your outfits .
#Text=You do n't have to spend a fortune on a name-brand bag .
#Text=However , spending a little bit more than you normally would will give you a bag that will last longer .
#Text=Look for good materials , a nice lining , and well-made seams .
#Text=Choose at least one bag that can add some color to your wardrobe , and pick another for its ability to blend in well ( think : neutral or black ) .
#Text=For a guy , pick a stylish bag that will go with most of your looks .
#Text=Leather is a classic choice , and you can get an upscale messenger bag or more classic briefcase .
#Text=Wear a classy shoe .
#Text=Having a few stylish shoes on hand is a great way to dress up your wardrobe .
#Text=For instance , a pair of classy heels ( such as black stilettos ) can take a suit up a level .
#Text=Similarly , a pair of leather boots can turn an average dress into something dressier and edgier .
#Text=A pair of wing-tipped shoes can turn an average suit into something much snazzier .
#Text=Once you find shoes you love ( that are of decent quality ) , consider getting them resoled when they wear out .
#Text=You 'll give them a new life !
#Text=Do n't go overboard .
#Text=While it can be tempting to add a big necklace , big sparkly earrings , a large scarf , and a bright watch , adding too much can push your outfit over the edge .
#Text=Aim for one large statement piece , and keep your other accessories more subdued .
#Text=The same goes for guys .
#Text=If you wear a flashy tie , lighten up on the fancy jewelry and vice versa .
